name: Document Template Pack Copy Test
description: Testing copy variants (Speed vs. Security) for the Document Template Pack to optimize for downloads.

copy.subtitle: Get instant access to all the real estate contracts and letters you need to close deals faster.
copy.whatsInItForMe: This saves you hours of frustrating guesswork and expensive legal fees. Use professional-grade documents immediately.
copy.target_audience: Investors and agents who need to create legally-sound documents without delays.
copy.pain_point: Creating contracts from scratch is slow, risky, and a major bottleneck to closing a deal.
copy.solution: Our template pack provides instant access to a complete set of customizable documents, letting you secure deals in minutes, not days.

copy.subtitle: Use our complete set of real estate contracts to look professional and protect your interests in every transaction.
copy.whatsInItForMe: This ensures you look credible and are legally protected, giving you peace of mind in every deal you make.
copy.target_audience: Investors who want to ensure they are legally protected and look professional to sellers and partners.
copy.pain_point: Using unprofessional or incomplete documents undermines your credibility and exposes you to unnecessary legal risks.
copy.solution: Our comprehensive template pack ensures you have the right, professional document for every situation, safeguarding your business.
